traceability.evidence: - src/config-loader.js implements loading, parsing, validation, and merging of `.dry-aged-deps.json` with CLI args - src/cli-options.js reads config file (default `.dry-aged-deps.json`), merges with CLI flags (CLI > config > defaults) - Tests in `test/cli.config-file.test.js` cover all required scenarios: default application, CLI override, invalid JSON, unknown keys, invalid values, custom config-file name, missing custom config file - `npx vitest run` passes 145/145 tests, including all config-file related tests - README.md contains documentation and example of the configuration file
traceability.notes: All mandatory acceptance criteria for config file support have been implemented and verified: the tool looks for `.dry-aged-deps.json` in the project root, supports all schema fields (minAge, severity, prod/dev thresholds, format), validates inputs with clear error messages, allows CLI overrides, works without a config file, and is documented in the README. The optional JSON schema file was noted as recommended but not required.
